content: are defined by code as architectural projections that provides weather protection, identity or decoration, and can be partially or totally supported to the building that it is attached. Generally comprised of a light weight frame structure to which a cladding is attached.
name: Awnings

content: Canopies are defined as frame structures or architectural projections incorporating fabric cladding that provide weather protection and identity. They can be structurally independant or supported by attachment to one or more buildings at one or more sides. whether covering large spans or creating intimate spaces fabric can fill roles still only being imagined
name: Canopies

content: Consulting Services: Guidance in fabric options and through Fabric Offerings and Selections, Prototype Design and Patterning, Fabric Engineering to all local and national codes, Project Management,
name: Consulting

content: Heavy Duty Curtains and Screens:Residntial, commercial or industrial we offer custom manufactured curtains and screens for emi sheilding, clean rooms, dividers, and facades incorprotaing creative lighting, graphics, sun and wind control, Curtains styles include roller, slide or stacked accordian style; manual or motorized.  Materials can be solid or mesh, decorated with pictures, graphics, lighting, or just left plain. we can define and offer options that will probably take your project further than you thought it could go.
name: Curtains

content: Custom Products: Fabricon has and does a vast repritoire of custom projects covering military, scientific, agricultural, recreational and areas we have yet to do. Our work can be found on every continent on earth from the Arctic to the Antarctic, Mountain Tops to deep Ocean we understand and research the fabrics that perform as required and do whats expected. From prototype work to high tech projects incorporating the latest fabrics and on the market.
name: Custom

content: Fabric Structures:Are characterized as having small mass relative to the applied load, which is determined by an optimization process. These type structures include air inflated, air supported,cable net, frame supported, geodesic dome, grid shell, tensegrity (cable-and-strut) and tensile or tension structures. Each system works incorporating fabric as cladding but rely on different geometrey and physics in the supporting framework and it's deployment. A frame supported structure, whether air, metal or other material, generally supports vertical loads in compression, a tensile structure must support the load in tension, a requirement for fabric, resulting in lateral loads not normally encountered in typical construction. Fabricon can assist in determining these loads and assist in the feasiblity planning and price of a project.We encourage our early involvement if fabric is being considered as issues not generally encountered can be understood and dealt with to avoid costly changes or roadblocks that can hurt the feasibility of a project. Fabrics are chosen to match the conditions and requirements of the project. we work with many type materials including PTFE coated glass, PVC coated polyester, ePTFE, ETFE, and HDPE
name: Fabric Structures

content: Fabric Structures: Are characterized as having small mass relative to the applied load, which is determined by an optimization process. These type structures include air inflated, air supported, cable net, frame supported, geodesic dome, grid shell, tensegrity (cable-and-strut) and tensile or tension structures.Each system works incorporating fabric as cladding but rely on different geometrey and physics in the supporting framework and it's deployment. A frame supported structure, whether air, metal or other material, generally supports vertical loads in compression, a tensile structure must support the load in tension, a requirement for fabric, resulting in lateral loads not normally encountered in typical construction. Fabricon can assist in determining these loads and assist in the feasiblity planning and price of a project. We encourage our early involvement if fabric is being considered as issues not generally encountered can be understood and dealt with to avoid costly changes or roadblocks that can hurt the feasibility of a project. name: Screens
